languages.text: {n}На сцену выталкивают двух людей... или кого-то, напоминающих людей. Это мутанты — омерзительные пародии на представителей Человечества, навсегда оскверненные изъянами плоти. Один одет в запачканные дорогие одеяния. Второй облачен в драную униформу местных стражей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}На сцену выталкивают дряхлого старика и... странное чудовище о двух ногах и руках, в котором вы с трудом узнаете даже не женщину — человеческое существо. Надвинутая на ее лицо маска кажется изощренной насмешкой. Толпа хохочет, наслаждаясь неожиданным зрелищем.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Two people, or something resembling people, are pushed onto the stage. They are mutants, hideous parodies of Humanity forever tainted by the imperfections of the flesh. One of them is dressed in stained yet expensive clothes. The other wears the tattered uniform of the local guards.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На сцену выталкивают двух людей... или кого-то, напоминающих людей. Это мутанты — омерзительные пародии на представителей Человечества, навсегда оскверненные изъянами плоти. Один одет в запачканные дорогие одеяния. Второй облачен в драную униформу местных стражей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Two people, or something resembling people, are pushed onto the stage. They are mutants, hideous parodies of Humanity forever tainted by the imperfections of the flesh. One of them is dressed in stained yet expensive robes. The other is wearing the tattered uniform of the local watchmen.{/n}

{n}Two people, or something resembling people, are pushed onto the stage. They are mutants, hideous parodies of Humanity forever tainted by the imperfections of the flesh. One of them is dressed in stained yet expensive clothes. The other wears the tattered uniform of the local guards.{/n}

languages.text: {n}两个人，或者是两个看起来像人的生物，被推到了行刑台上。那是两个变种人，肉体发生了丑恶的变异，仿佛在拙劣地嘲弄着人类的形态。其中一个人穿着脏污、昂贵的衣服，另一个人则穿着破旧的当地守卫制服。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two people, or something resembling people, are pushed onto the stage. They are mutants, hideous parodies of Humanity forever tainted by the imperfections of the flesh. One of them is dressed in stained yet expensive clothes. The other wears the tattered uniform of the local guards.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}两个人，或者是两个看起来像人的生物，被推到了行刑台上。那是两个变种人，肉体发生了丑恶的变异，仿佛在拙劣地嘲弄着人类的形态。其中一个人穿着脏污、昂贵的衣服，另一个人则穿着破旧的当地守卫制服。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dos personas, o algo parecido a personas, son conducidos a empujones hasta el estrado. Son mutantes, horribles parodias de la Humanidad mancilladas eternamente por las imperfecciones de la carne. Uno de ellos va vestido con ropas sucias pero bastante caras. El otro viste los restos harapientos del uniforme de la guardia local.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two people, or something resembling people, are pushed onto the stage. They are mutants, hideous parodies of Humanity forever tainted by the imperfections of the flesh. One of them is dressed in stained yet expensive clothes. The other wears the tattered uniform of the local guards.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dos personas, o algo parecido a personas, son conducidos a empujones hasta el estrado. Son mutantes, horribles parodias de la Humanidad mancilladas eternamente por las imperfecciones de la carne. Uno de ellos va vestido con ropas sucias pero bastante caras. El otro viste los restos harapientos del uniforme de la guardia local.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sahneye iki kişi ya da insana benzeyen bir şeyler itiliyor. Bunlar mutant; etin kusurlarıyla sonsuza dek lekelenmiş, İnsanlığın korkunç parodileri. Biri lekeli ama pahalı giysiler giymiş. Diğeri ise yerel muhafızların yırtık pırtık üniformasını giyiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two people, or something resembling people, are pushed onto the stage. They are mutants, hideous parodies of Humanity forever tainted by the imperfections of the flesh. One of them is dressed in stained yet expensive clothes. The other wears the tattered uniform of the local guards.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sahneye iki kişi ya da insana benzeyen bir şeyler itiliyor. Bunlar mutant; etin kusurlarıyla sonsuza dek lekelenmiş, İnsanlığın korkunç parodileri. Biri lekeli ama pahalı giysiler giymiş. Diğeri ise yerel muhafızların yırtık pırtık üniformasını giyiyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}2人の人間、あるいは人間に似た者が舞台に押し出される。彼らは、その肉体が不完全なことによって人類を永遠に汚す忌まわしいパロディである変異体である。それらのうちの一人は、汚れているが高級な衣服に身を包んでいる。もう一人は、現地の衛兵のボロボロになった制服を着ている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two people, or something resembling people, are pushed onto the stage. They are mutants, hideous parodies of Humanity forever tainted by the imperfections of the flesh. One of them is dressed in stained yet expensive clothes. The other wears the tattered uniform of the local guards.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}2人の人間、あるいは人間に似た者が舞台に押し出される。彼らは、その肉体が不完全なことによって人類を永遠に汚す忌まわしいパロディである変異体である。それらのうちの一人は、汚れているが高級な衣服に身を包んでいる。もう一人は、現地の衛兵のボロボロになった制服を着ている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deux individus, ou plutôt deux créatures qui en ont vaguement l'apparence, sont poussés sur l'estrade manu militari. Ce sont des mutants, d'affreuses parodies d'humanité à jamais défigurées par les imperfections de la chair. L'un d'entre eux porte des vêtements tachés, mais visiblement coûteux, tandis que le second est vêtu de l'uniforme déchiré des gardes locaux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two people, or something resembling people, are pushed onto the stage. They are mutants, hideous parodies of Humanity forever tainted by the imperfections of the flesh. One of them is dressed in stained yet expensive clothes. The other wears the tattered uniform of the local guards.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deux individus, ou plutôt deux créatures qui en ont vaguement l'apparence, sont poussés sur l'estrade manu militari. Ce sont des mutants, d'affreuses parodies d'humanité à jamais défigurées par les imperfections de la chair. L'un d'entre eux porte des vêtements tachés, mais visiblement coûteux, tandis que le second est vêtu de l'uniforme déchiré des gardes locaux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zwei Menschen werden auf die Bühne gestoßen, oder besser gesagt menschenähnliche Gestalten. Es sind Mutanten, grauenhafte Parodien der Menschheit, für immer durch den Makel des Fleisches entstellt. Einer von ihnen ist in schmutzige, aber in teure Kleider gewandet. Der andere trägt die zerschlissene Uniform der örtlichen Wachen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two people, or something resembling people, are pushed onto the stage. They are mutants, hideous parodies of Humanity forever tainted by the imperfections of the flesh. One of them is dressed in stained yet expensive clothes. The other wears the tattered uniform of the local guards.{/n}

Der andere trägt die zerschlissene Uniform der örtlichen Wachen.{/n}
